Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2013 11:18AM sheila63 wrote: I woke up on a Friday morning took my shower, and my hair started coming out in hand fulls.  I knew that was the day.  I called into work taking the day off, called my Mom, and we went wig shopping.  My hair dresser worked late that day to shave my head.  She cried more that I did.  On a good note, I got to sleep 30 extra minutes every day by not having to do my hair,  did not have to shave my legs (smoothest legs ever), and saved money from salon visits, and hair care products.  I know that does not make up for being bald, but it made it a bit easier. Hugs To You All Sheila

Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2013 12:38PM sheila63 wrote: I had chemo on a Thursday, took off Friday, and occasionally the following Monday depending on how I was feeling.  It helped to work, and try to keep my mind off off the situation. Hugs to All Sheila
